languages.text: {n}Мужчина стар и очень испуган. Его руки вцепились в дорогую трость: вы замечаете на ней сложный именной герб.{/n}
{n}The old man is terrified. His hands are clutching an expensive cane bearing an intricate family coat of arms.{/n}

languages.text: {n}老人被吓坏了，双手紧紧抓着昂贵的手杖，上面刻着复杂的家徽图案。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man is terrified. His hands are clutching an expensive cane bearing an intricate family coat of arms.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}老人被吓坏了，双手紧紧抓着昂贵的手杖，上面刻着复杂的家徽图案。{/n}

languages.text: {n}その老人は恐怖に震えていた。彼の手は、精巧な家紋が刻まれた高価な杖をしっかりと握りしめていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man is terrified. His hands are clutching an expensive cane bearing an intricate family coat of arms.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El viejo está aterrorizado. Sus manos aprietan con fuerza un lujoso bastón adornado con un elaborado escudo de armas familiar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man is terrified. His hands are clutching an expensive cane bearing an intricate family coat of arms.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yaşlı adam dehşete düşmüş. Elleri, karmaşık bir aile arması taşıyan pahalı bir bastona sarılmış.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der alte Mann ist völlig verängstigt. Seine Hände umklammern einen teuren Spazierstock mit einem aufwendigen Familienwappen.{/n}
